RC_CELL_ID, rc.LOCAL_AREA_CODE as RC_LOCAL_AREA_CODE, rc.NETWORK_NAME as RC_NETWORK_NAME, rc.MOBILE_COUNTRY_CODE as RC_MOBILE_COUNTRY_CODE, rc.MOBILE_NETWORK_CODE as RC_MOBILE_NETWORK_CODE, rc.MOBILE_MODE as RC_MOBILE_MODE, rc.TIME_RECEIVED as RC_TIME_RECEIVED, rs.SENDER_STATE_ID as RS_SENDER_STATE_ID, rs.TRACK_ID as RS_TRACK_ID, rs.POSITION_ID as RS_POSITION_ID, rs.TIME_RECEIVED as RS_TIME_RECEIVED, rs.STATE as RS_STATE, rh.CARDIAC_FUNCTION_ID as RH_CARDIAC_FUNCTION_ID, rh.TRACK_ID as RH_TRACK_ID, rh.POSITION_ID as RH_POSITION_ID, rh.TIME_RECEIVED as RH_TIME_RECEIVED, rh.HEARTRATE_IN_BPM as RH_HEARTRATE_IN_BPM, rh.HEARTRATE_MIN_IN_BPM as RH_HEARTRATE_MIN_IN_BPM, rh.HEARTRATE_MAX_IN_BPM as RH_HEARTRATE_MAX_IN_BPM, rh.HEARTRATE_AVG_IN_BPM as RH_HEARTRATE_AVG_IN_BPM, re.EMERGENCY_SIGNAL_ID as RE_EMERGENCY_SIGNAL_ID, re.TRACK_ID as RE_TRACK_ID, re.POSITION_ID as RE_POSITION_ID, re.TIME_RECEIVED as RE_TIME_RECEIVED, re.ACTIVE as RE_ACTIVE, re.MESSAGE as RE_MESSAGE, re.SMS_SUCCESSFULLY_SENT as RE_SMS_SUCCESSFULLY_SENT, prm.POSITION_ID as PRM_POSITION_ID, prm.SEQUENCE_ID as PRM_SEQUENCE_ID, prm.TRACK_ID as PRM_TRACK_ID, prm.TIME_RECORDED as PRM_TIME_RECORDED, PRE_LATITUDE_IN_DECIMAL, pre.LONGITUDE_IN_DECIMAL as PRE_LONGITUDE_IN_DECIMAL, pre.ACCURACY_IN_MTR as PRE_ACCURACY_IN_MTR, pre.ALTITUDE_IN_MTR as PRE_ALTITUDE_IN_MTR, pre.SPEED_IN_KM_PER_HOUR as PRE_SPEED_IN_KM_PER_HOUR, pre.ADDRESS as PRE_ADDRESS

left outer join T_POSITION sp on t.START_POSITION_ID = sp.POSITION_ID left outer join T_POSITION rp on t.RECENT_POSITION_ID = rp.POSITION_ID left outer join T_MOB_NW_CELL rc on t.RECENT_MOB_NW_CELL_ID = rc.MOB_NW_CELL_ID left outer join T_MESSAGE rm on t.RECENT_MESSAGE_ID = rm.MESSAGE_ID left outer join T_SENDER_STATE rs on t.RECENT_SENDER_STATE_ID = rs.SENDER_STATE_ID left outer join T_CARDIAC_FUNCTION rh on t.RECENT_CARDIAC_FUNCTION_ID = rh.CARDIAC_FUNCTION_ID left outer join T_EMERGENCY_SIGNAL re on t.RECENT_EMERGENCY_SIGNAL_ID = re.EMERGENCY_SIGNAL_ID left outer join T_POSITION prc on rc.POSITION_ID = prc.POSITION_ID left outer join T_POSITION prm on rm.POSITION_ID = prm.POSITION_ID left outer join T_POSITION prs on rs.POSITION_ID = prs.POSITION_ID left outer join T_POSITION prh on rs.POSITION_ID = prh.POSITION_ID left outer join T_POSITION pre on re.POSITION_ID = pre.POSITION_ID
sqlMap.select:
select t.*,
from T_TRACK t
where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false

select t.*,
from T_TRACK t
where t.TRACK_ID = ( select t.TRACK_ID from T_TRACK t where t.USER_ID = #userId#
and t.SENDER_ID = #senderId#
and t.IS_RELEASED = true
and t.IS_ACTIVE = true and t.REMOVE = false order by t.RECENT_POSITION_UPDATED desc limit 1)

select t.* from T_TRACK t where t.USER_ID = #userId#
and t.SENDER_ID = #senderId#
and t.IS_RELEASED = true
and t.IS_ACTIVE = true and t.REMOVE = false order by t.RECENT_POSITION_UPDATED desc limit 1
select * from T_TRACK t where t.SENDER_ID = #?# and t.IS_ACTIVE = true and t.REMOVE = false

select t.*,
from T_TRACK t
where t.SENDER_ID = #?# and t.IS_ACTIVE = true and t.REMOVE = false

select count(*) from T_TRACK t where t.USER_ID = #userId#
t.IS_RELEASED = true
t.IS_ACTIVE = true
t.SENDER_ID = #bySenderId#
t.TRACK_CREATED >= #byDateFrom#
t.TRACK_CREATED <= #byDateTo#
t.NAME like #bySearchStr#
t.IS_ACTIVE = #byActive#
and t.REMOVE = false

select t.*,
from T_TRACK t
where t.USER_ID = #userId#
t.IS_RELEASED = true
t.IS_ACTIVE = true
t.SENDER_ID = #bySenderId#
t.TRACK_CREATED >= #byDateFrom#
t.TRACK_CREATED <= #byDateTo#
t.NAME like #bySearchStr#
t.IS_ACTIVE = #byActive#
and t.REMOVE = false order by t.IS_ACTIVE desc, t.COUNT_EMERGENCY_SIGNALS desc, t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT desc limit #maxCountOfRecords#

select count(*) from T_TRACK t where t.USER_ID = #userId#
t.SENDER_ID = #bySenderId#
t.TRACK_CREATED >= #byDateFrom#
t.TRACK_CREATED <= #byDateTo#
t.NAME like #bySearchStr#
t.IS_ACTIVE = #byActive#
and t.REMOVE = false

select t.*,
from T_TRACK t
where t.USER_ID = #userId#
t.SENDER_ID = #bySenderId#
t.TRACK_CREATED >= #byDateFrom#
t.TRACK_CREATED <= #byDateTo#
t.NAME like #bySearchStr#
t.IS_ACTIVE = #byActive#
and t.REMOVE = false order by t.IS_ACTIVE desc, t.COUNT_EMERGENCY_SIGNALS desc, t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT desc limit #maxCountOfRecords#
select count(*) from T_TRACK t where t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT >= #byDateFrom# and t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT <= #byDateTo# and t.IS_ACTIVE = #byActive# and t.REMOVE = false

select t.*,
from T_TRACK t
where t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT >= #byDateFrom# and t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT <= #byDateTo# and t.IS_ACTIVE = #byActive# and t.REMOVE = false order by t.COUNT_EMERGENCY_SIGNALS desc, t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT desc limit #maxCountOfRecords#
select * from T_TRACK t where t.TRACK_ID = #?# and t.REMOVE = false
select t.TRACK_ID from T_TRACK t where t.TRACK_UPDATED <= #?# and t.REMOVE = false
select t.TRACK_ID from T_TRACK t where t.REMOVE = true limit 1
sqlMap.sql: insert into T_TRACK ( TRACK_ID, REMOVE, TRACK_CLIENT_ID, VERSION_MAJOR, NAME, IS_ACTIVE, IS_RELEASED, SENDER_ID, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_SYMBOL_ID, PHONE_NUMBER, USER_ID, TRACK_CREATED, TRACK_UPDATED, FIRST_POSITION_RECEIVED, RECENT_POSITION_UPDATED, LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT, COUNT_POSITIONS, COUNT_MOB_NW_CELLS, COUNT_MESSAGES, COUNT_SENDER_STATES, COUNT_CARDIAC_FUNCTIONS, COUNT_EMERGENCY_SIGNALS, DISTANCE_IN_MTR, CLIENT_START_MILEAGE_IN_MTR, CLIENT_MILEAGE_IN_MTR, CLIENT_RUNTIME_WITHOUT_PAUSES_IN_MSECS, CLIENT_RUNTIME_WITH_PAUSES_IN_MSECS, SPEED_IN_MTR_PER_HOUR, START_POSITION_ID, RECENT_POSITION_ID, RECENT_MOB_NW_CELL_ID, RECENT_MESSAGE_ID, RECENT_SENDER_STATE_ID, RECENT_EMERGENCY_SIGNAL_ID ) values ( #trackId#, #remove#, #trackClientId#, #versionMajor#, #name#, #active#, #released#, #senderId#, #senderName#, #senderSymbolId#, #phoneNumber#, #userId#, #timestamps.trackCreated#, #timestamps.trackUpdated#, #timestamps.firstPositionReceived#, #timestamps.recentPositionUpdated#, #timestamps.lastHeartbeatSent#, #countPositions#, #countMobNwCells#, #countMessages#, #countSenderStates#, #countCardiacFunctions#, #countEmergencySignals#, #distanceInMtr#, #clientStartMileageInMtr#, #clientMileageInMtr#, #clientRuntimeWithoutPausesInMSecs#, #clientRuntimeWithPausesInMSecs#, #speedInMtrPerHour#, #startPosition.positionId#, #recentPosition.positionId#, #recentMobNwCell.mobNwCellId#, #recentMessage.messageId#, #recentSenderState.senderStateId#, #recentEmergencySignal.emergencySignalId# )
sqlMap.update: update T_TRACK t set t.IS_ACTIVE = TRUE, t.TRACK_UPDATED = #trackUpdated# where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.IS_ACTIVE = FALSE, t.TRACK_UPDATED = #trackUpdated# where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.IS_ACTIVE = FALSE, t.TRACK_UPDATED = #trackUpdated# where t.SENDER_ID = #senderId# and t.IS_ACTIVE = TRUE and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.IS_RELEASED = TRUE, t.TRACK_UPDATED = #trackUpdated# where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.IS_RELEASED = FALSE, t.TRACK_UPDATED = #trackUpdated# where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.NAME = #trackName#, t.TRACK_UPDATED = #trackUpdated# where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.REMOVE = true where t.TRACK_ID = #?# and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.REMOVE = true where t.USER_ID = #?# and t.REMOVE = false

update T_TRACK t set t.TRACK_CLIENT_ID = #trackClientId#, t.PHONE_NUMBER = #phoneNumber#, t.TRACK_UPDATED = #timestamps.trackUpdated#, t.FIRST_POSITION_RECEIVED = #timestamps.firstPositionReceived#, t.RECENT_POSITION_UPDATED = #timestamps.recentPositionUpdated#, t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT = #timestamps.lastHeartbeatSent#, t.COUNT_POSITIONS = #countPositions#, t.COUNT_MOB_NW_CELLS = #countMobNwCells#, t.COUNT_MESSAGES = #countMessages#, t.COUNT_SENDER_STATES = #countSenderStates#, t.COUNT_CARDIAC_FUNCTIONS = #countCardiacFunctions#, t.COUNT_EMERGENCY_SIGNALS = #countEmergencySignals#, t.DISTANCE_IN_MTR = #distanceInMtr#, t.CLIENT_START_MILEAGE_IN_MTR = #clientStartMileageInMtr#, t.CLIENT_MILEAGE_IN_MTR = #clientMileageInMtr#, t.CLIENT_RUNTIME_WITHOUT_PAUSES_IN_MSECS = #clientRuntimeWithoutPausesInMSecs#, t.CLIENT_RUNTIME_WITH_PAUSES_IN_MSECS = #clientRuntimeWithPausesInMSecs#, t.SPEED_IN_MTR_PER_HOUR = #speedInMtrPerHour#, t.START_POSITION_ID = #startPosition.positionId#, t.RECENT_POSITION_ID = #recentPosition.positionId#, t.RECENT_MOB_NW_CELL_ID = #recentMobNwCell.mobNwCellId#, t.RECENT_MESSAGE_ID = #recentMessage.messageId#, t.RECENT_SENDER_STATE_ID = #recentSenderState.senderStateId#, t.RECENT_CARDIAC_FUNCTION_ID = #recentCardiacFunction.cardiacFunctionId#, t.RECENT_EMERGENCY_SIGNAL_ID = #recentEmergencySignal.emergencySignalId# where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false
update T_TRACK t set t.LAST_HEARTBEAT_SENT = #timestamps.lastHeartbeatSent# where t.TRACK_ID = #trackId# and t.REMOVE = false
sqlMap.delete: delete t FROM T_TRACK t where t.TRACK_ID = #?#
delete t FROM T_POSITION t where t.TRACK_ID = #?#
delete t FROM T_MESSAGE t where t.TRACK_ID = #?#
delete t FROM T_MOB_NW_CELL t where t.TRACK_ID = #?#
delete t FROM T_SENDER_STATE t where t.TRACK_ID = #?#
delete t FROM T_CARDIAC_FUNCTION t where t.TRACK_ID = #?#
delete t FROM T_EMERGENCY_SIGNAL t where t.TRACK_ID = #?#
